attributes.additional_details: In response to the disgraceful behaviour of MPs and civil servants in No 10 during the pandemic, MPs should accept responsibility of poor leadership and failing to act as role models by having pay frozen for 5 years.
attributes.background: Debate practical ways to express apology to the country for letting down constituents during the pandemic. A pay freeze is a step in the right direction and sets a firm example for any future leader who considers treating the rest of the nation with contempt.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
